entry.title: BIP proposal: Timelocked address fidelity bond for BIP39 seeds
entry.summary: In a message to Chris, ZmnSCPxj praised the BIP and noted that the fidelity bond does not commit to any specific scheme or application. This suggests that it could be used to prove existence across multiple applications. However, ZmnSCPxj expressed uncertainty about whether this could potentially be abused.
